Category: Facial Cleanser

chunk: Ingredients: ALOE BARBADENSIS LEAF (ALOE VERA) JUICE*, COCOS NUCIFERA (COCONUT) OIL*, PURIFIED WATER, POTASSIUM HYDROXIDE, HELIANTHUS ANNUUS (SUNFLOWER) SEED OIL*, SESAMUM INDICUM (SESAME) SEED OIL*, AZADIRACHTA INDICA (NEEM) LEAF OIL*, CYAMOPSIS TETRAGONOLOBA (GUAR) GUM*, CUCUMIS SATIVUS (CUCUMBER) EXTRACT*, NASTURTIUM OFFICINALE (WATERCRESS)
book: 2018-Nourish Organic Watercress + Cucumber Moisturizing Face Cleanser

chunk: SEED OIL*, SESAMUM INDICUM (SESAME) SEED OIL*, AZADIRACHTA INDICA (NEEM) LEAF OIL*, CYAMOPSIS TETRAGONOLOBA (GUAR) GUM*, CUCUMIS SATIVUS (CUCUMBER) EXTRACT*, NASTURTIUM OFFICINALE (WATERCRESS) EXTRACT*, CITRIC ACID, *CERTIFIED ORGANIC
book: 2018-Nourish Organic Watercress + Cucumber Moisturizing Face Cleanser

chunk: Ingredient concerns: MODERATE: Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
